thread.title: My 10-year-old daughter inspired me to start up my own venture
thread.title_full: My 10-year-old daughter inspired me to start up my own venture

title: My 10-year-old daughter inspired me to start up my own venture
text:
"My 10-year-old daughter inspired me to start up my own venture" 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
It was a long day at office for Mahesh Vorkady. He couldn't even check his phone. Only after reaching home in the night did he realize that he had missed several crucial messages in a WhatsApp group that connected him to the parents of his 10-year-old daughter's classmates. "The parents' group was buried among other groups. I felt bad because I had completely missed the conversation I should have been part of. Even my wife was busy that day and she had also missed the conversation. It was at that moment that I realized the need for a mobile application dedicated for the communication between p...
